OpenMiss: Collections for each area. For example, history resources can be grouped by country, time, etc. This way, people who are interested in specific country or era will have quick access to all relative resources. Order doesn’t really matter in this kind of collections. For topics like math or programming it would be nice to have a general guide that tells people where to start and what they should do next. Order is important in this kind of guide. Right now the user has to search for everting. It takes at least 30 mins for me during the experiment.
